Topic.Title: Co-Authouring on Muruun: Lords of the Underworld

Posts.EditableText: I'm looking for someone who is experienced enough with QDK or ASL to implement all the things that I want to do with my Muruun project. A lot of the things that I want to put in the game I have no idea how to code, even basic things like skill checks and random monster encounters. I expect this to be a pretty involving coding process as the game I have in mind is rather extensive in scope. Basically I'm looking to set up a working partnership and also to learn a little bit about coding in the process. Any interested parties can reply here or can shoot me an email at damienlavizzo@yahoo.com. I have a story outline and all my notes for the Muruun world if you need them. Thanks for reading. [/list]
